name: Legal Speed Racing
description:
Legal Speed Racing is our second racing game. We heard the comments of fans and we created a completely new game. Better control, physics and beautiful graphics. Look at screenshots below this text!

The game contains 38 tracks in several different environments and 12 high detailed cars. The game doesn't have ingame payments like other games, you pay once and get all the content, no more extra money!

Thank you for your purchase and have a good fun.

Note:
You can turn off music in Options.
"Beautiful" config of graphics quality contains antialiasing.
